page.title: 17BRAES OF DERWENT HUNT
page.content: {THE BRAES OF DERWENT FOX HUNT KENNELS} ARE SITUATED ON THE EDGE OF WHITTONSTALL VILLAGE.THE HUNT MEETS REGULARLY IN THE SEASON WHICH LASTS FROM SEPTEMBER UNTIL APRIL.THERE ARE 40 COUPLES OF FOX HOUNDS AT THE KENNELS WHICH ARE LOOKED AFTER BY THE HUNTSMAN AND FIRST WHIPPER-IN.ON A VISIT TO THE KENNELS, THE PUPILS OF WHITTONSTALL SCHOOL SAW ALL THE HOUNDS AND CHRISTOPHER MILLER TRIED ON THE HUNTSMAN'S RED COAT WHICH WAS TOO BIG FOR HIM, AND THEN TRIED TO BLOW THE HUNTING-HORN THE DOGS DIDN'T LIKE THE NOISE AND BAYED. THE CHILDREN SAW THE HOUND PUPPIES AND ONE OF THE PUPPIES CRIED WHEN A TERRIER BIT ITS NOSE THROUGH THE ENCLOSURE. NOT EVERYONE AGREES WITH FOX HUNTING THESE DAYS BUT IT IS STILL POPULAR AT WHITTONSTALL.
